content.question: Bodinâ€™s assertions about a legitimate monarchy are best understood as an example of which of the following developments in the sixteenth and seventeenth centuries?

choices.label: The ongoing rebellion of cultural minorities against the European governments
The creation of alternative political systems that rejected monarchy
The development of new ideas concerning the value of secular systems of government
The continuing calls for the creation of a unified monarchy to rule over western Europe

content.answer: The development of new ideas concerning the value of secular systems of government
